idea: Use NLP to isolate and code what is authentical Socrates, Plato and Xenophon (and technically Aristophanes but it was a satire) are the only living records we have of Socrates. Plato's philosophy is distinct from Socrates and using him as he used him as a character, much like Aristophanes, in his late works we can not tell when we stop getting a true depiction of Socrates. Someone should use some NLP to dissect Xenophon and Plato's writings on Aristotle to attempt the saying of Socrates
